item.title: Aspose.Words for Reporting Services 21.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for Reporting Services 21.12. Full List of Issues Covering all Changes in this Release Key Summary Category Upgrade to the latest version of Aspose.Words for .NET (21.12) New feature WORDSRS-84 Row height of table is incorrect when exported to Word Bug WORDSRS-192 ResetPageNumber property of SSRS report is not working when exporting to RTF/Doc/Docx Bug
